title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt 16 DLC Pack (GOG)
description:
This DLC pack contains all the updated DLC as of 8/14/2015. Download and re-run the installers to update them.

Contains sixteen (16) DLC for The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

DLC included (newest to oldest):
- New Game + (requires patch v1.08 or above)
- New Finisher Animations (requires patch v1.07 or above)
- Alternative Look for Ciri (requires patch v1.07 or above)
- New Quest: Where The Cat And Wolf Play...
- Contract: Skellige's Most Wanted
- Skellige Armor Set
- New Quest - Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear
- Alternative Look for Triss
- New Quest: Fool's Gold
- Ballad Heroes: Neutral Gwent Card Set
- Nilfgaardian Armor Set
- Elite Crossbow Set
- Contract: Missing Miners
- Alternative Look for Yennefer
- Temerian Armor Set
- Beard and Hairstyle Set for Geralt 

Install instructions: 
1. Install
2. Play, no cracks needed as DRM free
If you like this game, please support the developers and BUY IT! Remember to seed so others can enjoy
